# NSVerticalDirection.Set

**Structure**

An efficient set of vertical directions.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen struct Set
```

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a set of directions containing only the specified direction.

## Instance Methods

- **contains(_:)**
- **insert(_:)**
- **remove(_:)**
- **update(with:)**

## Type Properties

- **all**: A set containing all vertical directions (up and down)
- **down**: A set containing only the down direction.
- **up**: A set containing only the up direction.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- Hashable
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
